sentences.en: All modern vessels of any size are fitted with radar installations.
sentences.cn: 所有现代化船只都有雷达装置.

sentences.en: Enemy planes were picked up by our radar.
sentences.cn: 敌机被我们的雷达发现了.

sentences.en: Enemy ships were detected on the radar.
sentences.cn: 敌舰的影像已显现在雷达上.

sentences.en: It was yet another case where the human eye outperformed radar.
sentences.cn: 这是肉眼胜过雷达的又一事例。

sentences.en: Its radar equipment was powered by a nuclear reactor.
sentences.cn: 其雷达装置由一核反应堆提供动力.

sentences.en: The coastline can now be monitored by radar.
sentences.cn: 现在能用雷达监测海岸线了。

sentences.en: The pilot homed in by means of radar, despite the poor visibility.
sentences.cn: 尽管能见度极差,飞机由雷达导航返航了.

sentences.en: The radar beam can track a number of targets almost simultaneously.
sentences.cn: 雷达波几乎可以同时追着多个目标.

sentences.en: The radar detected three enemy aircraft in the sky.
sentences.cn: 这个雷达发现了三架敌机.

sentences.en: The ship, with the help of radar, sailed in thick fog.
sentences.cn: 船借助于雷达在浓雾中航行.

sentences.en: The watchtower followed the aircraft by radar.
sentences.cn: 了望塔通过雷达追踪这架飞机的飞行.

sentences.en: They are following the flight of an aircraft by radar.
sentences.cn: 他们正在用雷达追踪一架飞机的飞行.

sentences.en: They located the ship by radar.
sentences.cn: 他们通过雷达确定了船只的位置。

sentences.en: This radar is operated by an electronic pulse.
sentences.cn: 这台雷达依靠电子脉冲来操作.

sentences.en: To do this, scientists have to devise methods using radar and underwater television.
sentences.cn: 为此，科学家还要设计出使用雷达和水下电视的方法。

sentences.en: To do this, scientists have to devise Methods: Using radar and underwater television.
sentences.cn: 为此, 科学家还要设计出使用雷达和水下电视的方法.

sentences.en: We could see the plane quite clearly on the radar screen.
sentences.cn: 我们在雷达屏幕上可清晰地看到飞机。
